title: Login failure on Safari
description: Users report login failing on Safari 14. Appears to be cookie-related.

title: Memory leak in data parser
description: After prolonged use, the data parser shows increasing memory usage.

title: Button misaligned on mobile
description: The submit button is not centered on mobile viewports.

title: Crash when uploading file
description: The app crashes when users upload files larger than 50MB.
